response.overview: A second of volume of terror delivers two more chilling films from Kazuo Umezz's Horror Theater. In Snake Girl, a city girl spends her vacation with her cousin in a rural village, where the unwelcoming locals keep calling her by a strange and disturbing name. Then, in The Wish, a lonely boy strikes up a friendship with a carved wooden head, only to find out that his imagination has brought it to life.
response.title: Kazuo Umezz's Horror Theater: Vol. 2
